pullrequest.title: [DRC Expo: Foosball] Model plugin that controls the rods.

content.raw:
Let think of a better name than <oculus> here:
Either something that explains that the hydra rotation is inverted <invert_hydra_rotation>, or that this particular player does not have a separate display <team_has_no_display> or <shares_other_team_monitor> or  better.
content.html: Let think of a better name than <oculus> here: Either something that explains that the hydra rotation is inverted <invert_hydra_rotation>, or that this particular player does not have a separate display <team_has_no_display> or <shares_other_team_monitor> or better.
